<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="pytz-package">pytz package<a class="anchor-link" href="#pytz-package">¶</a></h2><p>pytc is a timezone definition package, and it is very powerful dealing with tiemzones.</p>
<p>you can install it through <code>pip</code>:</p>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Add-time-zone-information-to-a-naive-datetime-object">Add time zone information to a naive datetime object<a class="anchor-link" href="#Add-time-zone-information-to-a-naive-datetime-object">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">datetime</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">datetime</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pytz</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">timezone</span>

<span class="n">date_str</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"2009-05-05 22:28:15"</span>
<span class="n">datetime_obj</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strptime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">date_str</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"%Y-%m-</span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s2"> %H:%M:%S"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">datetime_obj_utc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime_obj</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tzinfo</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">timezone</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'UTC'</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">datetime_obj_utc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strftime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"%Y-%m-</span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s2"> %H:%M:%S %Z%z"</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

</div>

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Add-non-UTC-time-zone-information-to-a-naive-datetime-object">Add non-UTC time zone information to a naive datetime object<a class="anchor-link" href="#Add-non-UTC-time-zone-information-to-a-naive-datetime-object">¶</a></h2>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong>ATTENTION:</strong> <code>datetime.replace()</code> does not handle daylight savings time correctly.<br>
The <strong>correct</strong> way is to use <code>timezone.localize()</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">datetime</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">datetime</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pytz</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">timezone</span>

<span class="n">date_str</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"2014-05-28 22:28:15"</span>
<span class="n">datetime_obj_naive</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strptime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">date_str</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"%Y-%m-</span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s2"> %H:%M:%S"</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># Wrong way!</span>
<span class="n">datetime_obj_pacific</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime_obj_naive</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tzinfo</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">timezone</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'US/Pacific'</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">datetime_obj_pacific</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strftime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"%Y-%m-</span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s2"> %H:%M:%S %Z%z"</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="c1"># Right way!</span>
<span class="n">datetime_obj_pacific</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">timezone</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'US/Pacific'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">localize</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">datetime_obj_naive</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">datetime_obj_pacific</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strftime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"%Y-%m-</span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s2"> %H:%M:%S %Z%z"</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>

<h2 id="Convert-time-zones">Convert time zones<a class="anchor-link" href="#Convert-time-zones">¶</a></h2><p>Use <code>datetime.astimezone(tz)</code> to convert timezone</p>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>

    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">datetime</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">datetime</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pytz</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">timezone</span>

<span class="n">fmt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"%Y-%m-</span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s2"> %H:%M:%S %Z%z"</span>

<span class="c1"># Current time in UTC</span>
<span class="n">now_utc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">now</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">timezone</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'UTC'</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">now_utc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strftime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fmt</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="c1"># Convert to US/Pacific time zone</span>
<span class="n">now_pacific</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">now_utc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astimezone</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">timezone</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'US/Pacific'</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">now_pacific</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strftime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fmt</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="c1"># Convert to Europe/Berlin time zone</span>
<span class="n">now_berlin</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">now_pacific</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astimezone</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">timezone</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Europe/Berlin'</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">now_berlin</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strftime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fmt</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Deal-with-teimzone-format-in-windows-registry">Deal with teimzone format in windows registry<a class="anchor-link" href="#Deal-with-teimzone-format-in-windows-registry">¶</a></h2><ul>
<li>Some APIs/packages using timezone farmat as imported from <code>Windows Registry</code></li>
<li>I don't really have a good method to deal with it, except using a big timezone dictionary to map it</li>
<li>This is inspired by this post: <a href="https://stackoverflow.com/questions/16156597/how-can-i-convert-windows-timezones-to-timezones-pytz-understands#answer-16157049">python - How can I convert windows timezones to timezones pytz understands? - Stack Overflow</a></li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [8]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># A big dictionary mapping windows registry timezone format </span>
<span class="c1"># to the format readable by python</span>
<span class="n">TIMEZONES</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s2">"AUSCENTRALSTANDARDTIME"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">"Australia/Darwin"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s2">"AUSEASTERNSTANDARDTIME"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">"Australia/Sydney"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s2">"AFGHANISTANSTANDARDTIME"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">"Asia/Kabul"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s2">"ALASKANSTANDARDTIME"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">"America/Anchorage"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s2">"ARABSTANDARDTIME"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">"Asia/Riyadh"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s2">"ARABIANSTANDARDTIME"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">"Asia/Dubai"</span><span class="p">,</span>
